languages.text: {n}Джай весело ухмыляется.{/n} "У Великого, знаете ли, могут быть совершенно иные планы на наши души. Да только что остается верным помимо самой веры? Лишь уповать на милость Его. Император защищает, шерин".
{n}Jae chuckles.{/n} "The Exalted One, you know, may have other designs on our souls. But what remains faithful beyond faith itself? We can but trust in His grace. The Emperor protects, shereen."
languages.original_text: {n}Джай весело ухмыляется.{/n} "У Великого, знаете ли, могут быть совершенно иные планы на наши души. Да только что остается верным помимо самой веры? Лишь уповать на милость Его. Император защищает, шерин".

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae chuckles.{/n} "The Exalted One, you know, may have other designs on our souls. But what remains faithful beyond faith itself? We can but trust in His grace. The Emperor protects, shereen."
{n}Jae chuckles.{/n} "The Exalted One, you know, may have other designs on our souls. But what remains faithful beyond faith itself? We can but trust in His grace. The Emperor protects, shereen."
{n}Jae chuckles.{/n} "The Exalted One, you know, may have other designs on our souls. But what remains faithful beyond faith itself? We can but trust in His grace. The Emperor protects, shereen."
{n}Jae chuckles.{/n} "The Exalted One, you know, may have other designs on our souls. But what remains faithful beyond faith itself? We can but trust in His grace. The Emperor protects, shereen."

languages.text: {n}ジェイがくすくすと笑った。{/n}「エグザルテッド・ワンはあたしたちに他の運命を用意してるかもしれないわ。だけど、信じ続けることが何よりの忠誠心の表れだと思うの。主の恩寵を信じるしかないのよ。皇帝のご加護を、シャリーン」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae chuckles.{/n} "The Exalted One, you know, may have other designs on our souls. But what remains faithful beyond faith itself? We can but trust in His grace. The Emperor protects, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイがくすくすと笑った。{/n}「エグザルテッド・ワンはあたしたちに他の運命を用意してるかもしれないわ。だけど、信じ続けることが何よりの忠誠心の表れだと思うの。主の恩寵を信じるしかないのよ。皇帝のご加護を、シャリーン」

languages.text: {n}婕伊咯咯地笑了。{/n}“至高无上的神皇或许对我们的灵魂另有安排，不过，还有什么能比信仰本身更忠贞？我们只能相信祂的恩典。愿神皇保佑你，亲爱的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae chuckles.{/n} "The Exalted One, you know, may have other designs on our souls. But what remains faithful beyond faith itself? We can but trust in His grace. The Emperor protects, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊咯咯地笑了。{/n}“至高无上的神皇或许对我们的灵魂另有安排，不过，还有什么能比信仰本身更忠贞？我们只能相信祂的恩典。愿神皇保佑你，亲爱的。”

languages.text: {n}Jae lacht.{/n} "Der Erhabene hat vielleicht etwas anderes mit unseren Seelen vor, wisst Ihr? Doch der Glaube steht über allem. Uns bleibt nur, an seine Gnade zu glauben. Der Imperator schützt uns, Shereen."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae chuckles.{/n} "The Exalted One, you know, may have other designs on our souls. But what remains faithful beyond faith itself? We can but trust in His grace. The Emperor protects, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae lacht.{/n} "Der Erhabene hat vielleicht etwas anderes mit unseren Seelen vor, wisst Ihr? Doch der Glaube steht über allem. Uns bleibt nur, an seine Gnade zu glauben. Der Imperator schützt uns, Shereen."

languages.text: {n}Jae se ríe.{/n} «Es posible que el Exaltado tenga otros planes, pero ¿en qué se puede creer más allá de la fe? Solo podemos acogernos a su misericordia. El Emperador protege, shereen».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae chuckles.{/n} "The Exalted One, you know, may have other designs on our souls. But what remains faithful beyond faith itself? We can but trust in His grace. The Emperor protects, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae se ríe.{/n} «Es posible que el Exaltado tenga otros planes, pero ¿en qué se puede creer más allá de la fe? Solo podemos acogernos a su misericordia. El Emperador protege, shereen».

languages.text: {n}Jae pousse un petit rire.{/n} « Il se peut que l'Exalté ait d'autres desseins pour nos âmes, vous savez. Mais que reste-t-il aux fidèles au-delà de la foi ? Nous ne pouvons que nous fier à Sa grâce. L'Empereur nous protège, shereen. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae chuckles.{/n} "The Exalted One, you know, may have other designs on our souls. But what remains faithful beyond faith itself? We can but trust in His grace. The Emperor protects, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae pousse un petit rire.{/n} « Il se peut que l'Exalté ait d'autres desseins pour nos âmes, vous savez. Mais que reste-t-il aux fidèles au-delà de la foi ? Nous ne pouvons que nous fier à Sa grâce. L'Empereur nous protège, shereen. »

languages.text: {n}Jae kıkırdıyor.{/n} "Görkemli'nin ruhlarımız için farklı şeyler tasarlamış olması da ihtimal dâhilinde. Peki ya inancın kendisinin ötesinde inançlı kalan nedir? Tek yapabileceğimiz, O'nun inayetine güvenmek. İmparator korur şirinim."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae chuckles.{/n} "The Exalted One, you know, may have other designs on our souls. But what remains faithful beyond faith itself? We can but trust in His grace. The Emperor protects, shereen."
